bundle_se.properties.tutorial.intro:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.drill:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.
Click the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[]. Place it on a copper vein by clicking.
[accent]Right-click[] to stop building.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.
Tap the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[].
Place it on a copper vein by tapping, then press the[accent] checkmark[] below to confirm your selection.
Press the[accent] X button[] to cancel placement.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Each block has different stats. Each drill can only mine certain ores.
To check a block's info and stats,[accent] tap the "?" button while selecting it in the build menu.[]

[accent]Access the Mechanical Drill's stats now.[]
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.conveyor:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent]Hold down the mouse to place in a line.[]
Hold[accent] CTRL[] while selecting a line to place diagonally.

[accent]{0}/{1} conveyors
[accent]0/1 items delivered
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent] Place in a line by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.

[accent]{0}/{1} conveyors
[accent]0/1 items delivered
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensive structures must be built to repel the[lightgray] enemy[].\nBuild a[accent] duo turret[] near your base.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.drillturret:
Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.
Place a drill near to the turret
 Lead conveyors into the turret to supply it with copper.

[accent]Ammo delivered: 0/1
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.pause:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press space to pause.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press this button in the top left to pause.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.unpause: Now press space again to unpause.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Now press it again to unpause.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Hold down right-click[] to destroy all blocks in a selection.[]

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the right of your core.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Select deconstruction mode[], then tap a block to begin breaking it.
Destroy an area by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.
Press the checkmark button to confirm breaking.

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the right of your core.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
In some situations, taking items directly from blocks is necessary.
To do this, [accent]tap a block[] with items in it, then [accent]tap the item[] in the inventory. Multiple items can be withdrawn by [accent]tapping and holding[].

[accent]Withdraw some copper from the core.[]
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.deposit: Deposit items into blocks by dragging from your ship to the destination block.\n\n[accent]Deposit your copper back into the core.[]
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.waves:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves.[accent] Click[] to shoot.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves. Your ship will automatically fire at enemies.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_se.properties.tutorial.launch:
Once you reach a specific wave, you are able to[accent] launch the core[], leaving your defenses behind and[accent] obtaining all the resources in your core.[]
These resources can then be used to research new technology.

[accent]Press the launch button.
bundle_se.properties.item.copper.description: The most basic structural material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle_se.properties.item.lead.description: A basic starter material. Used extensively in electronics and liquid transportation blocks.
bundle_se.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_se.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralized carbon, used for ammunition and electrical insulation.
bundle_se.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_se.properties.item.coal.description: Fossilized plant matter, formed long before the seeding event. Used extensively for fuel and resource production.
bundle_se.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_se.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_se.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_se.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor. Applications in solar panels, complex electronics and homing turret ammunition.
bundle_se.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_se.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_se.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_se.properties.item.spore-pod.description: A pod of synthetic spores, synthesized from atmospheric concentrations for industrial purposes. Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_se.properties.item.blast-compound.description: An unstable compound used in bombs and explosives. Synthesized from spore pods and other volatile substances. Use as fuel is not advised.
bundle_se.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_se.properties.liquid.water.description: The most useful liquid. Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_se.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle_se.properties.liquid.oil.description: A liquid used in advanced material production. Can be converted into coal as fuel, or sprayed and set on fire as a weapon.
bundle_se.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: An inert, non-corrosive liquid created from water and titanium. Has extremely high heat capacity. Extensively used as coolant.
bundle_se.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: The standard control mech. Based on a Dagger unit, with upgraded armor and building capabilities. Has more damage output than a Dart ship.
bundle_se.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: A fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks. Does little damage against structures, but can kill large groups of enemy units very quickly with its arc lightning weapons.
bundle_se.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: The support mech. Heals allied blocks by shooting at them. Can heal allies in a radius with its repair ability.
bundle_se.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: A bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults. Its armor can block up to 90% of incoming damage.
bundle_se.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: The standard control ship. Reasonably fast and light, but has little offensive capability and low mining speed.
bundle_se.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: A hit-and-run strike ship. While initially slow, it can accelerate to great speeds and fly by enemy outposts, dealing large amounts of damage with its lightning and missiles.
bundle_se.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: A heavy bomber, built for construction and destroying enemy fortifications. Reasonably well armored.
bundle_se.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: A large, well-armored gunship. Equipped with an incendiary repeater. Highly maneuverable.
bundle_se.properties.unit.draug.description: A primitive mining drone. Cheap to produce. Expendable. Automatically mines copper and lead in the vicinity. Delivers mined resources to the closest core.
bundle_se.properties.unit.spirit.description: A modified draug drone, designed for repair instead of mining. Automatically fixes any damaged blocks in the area.
bundle_se.properties.unit.phantom.description: An advanced drone unit. Follows users. Assists in block construction.
bundle_se.properties.unit.dagger.description: The most basic ground mech. Cheap to produce. Overwhelming when used in swarms.
bundle_se.properties.unit.crawler.description: A ground unit consisting of a stripped-down frame with high explosives strapped on top. Not particular durable. Explodes on contact with enemies.
bundle_se.properties.unit.titan.description: An advanced, armored ground unit. Attacks both ground and air targets. Equipped with two miniature Scorch-class flamethrowers.
bundle_se.properties.unit.fortress.description: A heavy artillery mech. Equipped with two modified Hail-type cannons for long-range assault on enemy structures and units.
bundle_se.properties.unit.eruptor.description: A heavy mech designed to take down structures. Fires a stream of slag at enemy fortifications, melting them and setting volatiles on fire.
bundle_se.properties.unit.wraith.description: A fast, hit-and-run interceptor unit. Targets power generators.
bundle_se.properties.unit.ghoul.description: A heavy carpet bomber. Rips through enemy structures, targeting critital infrastructure.
bundle_se.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Compresses chunks of coal into pure sheets of graphite.
bundle_se.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle_se.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with pure coal. Produces silicon.
bundle_se.properties.block.kiln.description: Smelts sand and lead into the compound known as metaglass. Requires small amounts of power to run.
bundle_se.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_se.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Synthesizes phase fabric from radioactive thorium and sand. Requires massive amounts of power to function.
bundle_se.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Combines titanium, lead, silicon and copper to produce surge alloy.
bundle_se.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Mixes water and fine titanium powder into cryofluid. Essential for thorium reactor usage.
bundle_se.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Crushes and mixes clusters of spores with pyratite to produce blast compound.
bundle_se.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_se.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in wave turrets.
bundle_se.properties.block.separator.description: Separates slag into its mineral components. Outputs the cooled result.
bundle_se.properties.block.spore-press.description: Compresses spore pods under extreme pressure to synthesize oil.
bundle_se.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifes oil into chunks of coal.
bundle_se.properties.block.incinerator.description: Vaporizes any excess item or liquid it receives.
bundle_se.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_se.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_se.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_se.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.
bundle_se.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_se.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nDecent protection from enemies.
bundle_se.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nDecent protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_se.properties.block.phase-wall.description: A wall coated with special phase-based reflective compound. Deflects most bullets upon impact.
bundle_se.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: A wall coated with special phase-based reflective compound. Deflects most bullets upon impact.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_se.properties.block.surge-wall.description: An extremely durable defensive block.\nBuilds up charge on bullet contact, releasing it randomly.
bundle_se.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: An extremely durable defensive block.\nBuilds up charge on bullet contact, releasing it randomly.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_se.properties.block.door.description: A small door. Can be opened or closed by tapping.
bundle_se.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door. Can be opened and closed by tapping.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_se.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_se.properties.block.mend-projector.description: An upgraded version of the Mender. Repairs blocks in its vicinity.\nOptionally uses phase fabric to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_se.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings.\nOptionally uses phase fabric to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_se.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage.\nOverheats if too much damage is sustained. Optionally uses coolant to prevent overheating. Phase fabric can be used to increase shield size.
bundle_se.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_se.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into blocks. Rotatable.
bundle_se.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_se.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_se.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_se.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_se.properties.block.sorter.description: Sorts items. If an item matches the selection, it is allowed to pass. Otherwise, the item is outputted to the left and right.
bundle_se.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items, then outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.\n\n[scarlet]Never use next to production inputs, as they will get clogged by output.[]
bundle_se.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router. Splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_se.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: A combination splitter and router. Only outputs to the left and right if the front path is blocked.
bundle_se.properties.block.mass-driver.description: The ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range. Requires power to operate.
bundle_se.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_se.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump. Pumps more liquid, but requires power.
bundle_se.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Moves liquids forward. Used in conjunction with pumps and other conduits.
bundle_se.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: An advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_se.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_se.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use for creating buffers in situations with non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_se.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_se.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_se.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_se.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_se.properties.block.power-node-large.description: An advanced power node with greater range and more connections.
bundle_se.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_se.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power as a buffer in times of surplus energy. Outputs power in times of deficit.
bundle_se.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_se.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning flammable materials, such as coal.
bundle_se.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_se.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: An advanced combustion generator. More efficient, but requires additional water for generating steam.
bundle_se.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_se.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A simple, reliable generator. Uses the heat of decaying radioactive compounds to produce energy at a slow rate.
bundle_se.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_se.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: A significantly more efficient version of the standard solar panel.
bundle_se.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates significant amounts of power from thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at full capacity.
bundle_se.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_se.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely. Only capable of mining basic resources.
bundle_se.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill, capable of mining titanium. Mines at a faster pace than a mechanical drill.
bundle_se.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Capable of mining thorium.
bundle_se.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_se.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts groundwater. Used in locations with no surface water available.
bundle_se.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates tiny concentrations of spores in the atmosphere into industry-ready pods.
bundle_se.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power, sand and water to drill for oil.
bundle_se.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_se.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_se.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_se.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. An unloader block can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_se.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. An unloader block can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_se.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping.
bundle_se.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch.
bundle_se.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: An improved version of the launch pad. Stores more items. Launches more frequently.
bundle_se.properties.block.duo.description: A small, cheap turret. Useful against ground units.
bundle_se.properties.block.scatter.description: An essential anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_se.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle_se.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized turret. Shoots streams of liquid at enemies. Automatically extinguishes fires when supplied with water.
bundle_se.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized anti-ground laser turret. Charges and fires powerful beams of energy.
bundle_se.properties.block.arc.description: A small close-range electric turret. Fires arcs of electricity at enemies.
bundle_se.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized missile turret. Attacks both air and ground enemies. Fires homing missiles.
bundle_se.properties.block.salvo.description: A larger, more advanced version of the Duo turret. Fires quick salvos of bullets at the enemy.
bundle_se.properties.block.fuse.description: A large, close-range energy turret. Fires three piercing beams at nearby enemies.
bundle_se.properties.block.ripple.description: An extremely poweful artillery turret. Shoots clusters of shells at enemies over long distances.
bundle_se.properties.block.cyclone.description: A large anti-air and anti-ground turret. Fires explosive clumps of flak at nearby units.
bundle_se.properties.block.spectre.description: A massive dual-barreled cannon. Shoots large armor-piercing bullets at air and ground targets.
bundle_se.properties.block.meltdown.description: A massive laser cannon. Charges and fires a persistent laser beam at nearby enemies. Requires coolant to operate.
bundle_se.properties.block.command-center.description: Issues movement commands to allied units across the map.\nCauses units to patrol, attack an enemy core or retreat to the core/factory. When no enemy core is present, units will default to patrolling under the attack command.
bundle_se.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_se.properties.block.dart-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into a basic attack mech.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle_se.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into a lightly armored hit-and-run attack mech.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle_se.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into an advanced support mech.\nUse by tapping while st
bundle_se.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into a heavily-armored missile mech.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle_se.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Provides transformation into a quick, lightly-armored interceptor.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle_se.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Provides transformation into a heavy support bomber.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle_se.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Provides transformation into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.

bundle_tk.properties.save.corrupted: [accent]Kayit gecersiz!\nOyunu guncellediysen, bu buyuk ihtimalle degistirilecek vebu bir [scarlet]sorun degildir.[]

Once the data is imported, your game will exit immediately.
bundle_tk.properties.classic.export.text: [accent]Mindustry[] has just had a major update.\nClassic (v3.5 build 40) save or map data has been detected. Would you like to export these saves to your phone's home folder, for use in the Mindustry Classic app?

bundle_tk.properties.zone.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.desertWastes.description:
These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.
Coal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.

[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_tk.properties.zone.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
bundle_tk.properties.settings.clear.confirm: Are you sure you want to clear this data?\nWhat is done cannot be undone!
bundle_tk.properties.settings.clearall.confirm: [scarlet]WARNING![]\nThis will clear all data, including saves, maps, unlocks and keybinds.\nOnce you press 'ok' the game will wipe all data and automatically exit.

bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.intro:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.drill: Mining manually is inefficient.\n[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.\nPlace one on a copper vein.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.
Tap the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[].
Place it on a copper vein by tapping, then press the[accent] checkmark[] below to confirm your selection.
Press the[accent] X button[] to cancel placement.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Each block has different stats. Each drill can only mine certain ores.
To check a block's info and stats,[accent] tap the "?" button while selecting it in the build menu.[]

[accent]Access the Mechanical Drill's stats now.[]
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.\nMake a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent] Place in a line by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.

[accent]{0}/{1} conveyors placed in line
[accent]0/1 items delivered
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensive structures must be built to repel the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\nBuild a duo turret near your base.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.\nPlace a drill next to the turret to supply it with mined copper.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.pause:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press space to pause.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press this button in the top left to pause.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.unpause: Now press space again to unpause.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Now press it again to unpause.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Hold down right-click[] to destroy all blocks in a selection.[]

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Select deconstruction mode[], then tap a block to begin breaking it.
Destroy an area by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.
Press the checkmark button to confirm breaking.

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
In some situations, taking items directly from blocks is necessary.
To do this, [accent]tap a block[] with items in it, then [accent]tap the item[] in the inventory.
Multiple items can be withdrawn by [accent]tapping and holding[].

[accent]Withdraw some copper from the core.[]
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.deposit: Deposit items into blocks by dragging from your ship to the destination block.\n\n[accent]Deposit your copper back into the core.[]
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.waves: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] approaches.\n\nDefend your core for 2 waves. Build more turrets.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves. Your ship will automatically fire at enemies.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.launch:
Once you reach a specific wave, you are able to[accent] launch the core[], leaving your defenses behind and[accent] obtaining all the resources in your core.[]
These resources can then be used to research new technology.

[accent]Press the launch button.
bundle_tk.properties.item.copper.description: ise yayar bir materyal. Kazma makineleriyle yada tasimayla alinabilir.
bundle_tk.properties.item.lead.description: Basit bir baslangic materyali. sivi tasimada kullanilabilir.
bundle_tk.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_tk.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralized carbon, used for ammunition and electrical insulation.
bundle_tk.properties.item.sand.description: karistirma maddesi olark kullanilan yaygin bir madde.
bundle_tk.properties.item.titanium.description: Nadir ve hafif bir materyal. Hava araclarinda, Kazma makinelerinde ve sivi tasima tuplerinde kullanilir.
bundle_tk.properties.item.thorium.description: Nukleer yakit olarak kullanilan sert ve nukleer bir materyal.
bundle_tk.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_tk.properties.item.silicon.description: Gunes panellerinde ve gelismis materallerde kullanilan bir materyal
bundle_tk.properties.item.plastanium.description: hafif bir madde, hava makinelerinde ve silahlara kursun olarak kullanilir.
bundle_tk.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_tk.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_tk.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_tk.properties.item.blast-compound.description: Bombalar ve patlayicilarda kullanilabilir. Yakit olarak kullanilmasi tavsiye edilmez.
bundle_tk.properties.item.pyratite.description: Yakici silahlar icin yakici bir madde.
bundle_tk.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_tk.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle_tk.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_tk.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.
bundle_tk.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: Standart Robot. Kendisine yardim etmesi icin 3 adet dron cikartabilir
bundle_tk.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: vur kac icin yapilmis olan hizli bir makine. duvarlara az hasar verir ama gruplari temizlemesiyle bilinir.
bundle_tk.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: Destek bir robot. alaninin icindeki herseyi tamir edebilir
bundle_tk.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: Tank ve hasar vurucu bir robot. Zirhi ona %90 hasari engellemesini saglayan bir kalkan verir.
bundle_tk.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: Var olan en hizli robot. guclu bir vurkacci
bundle_tk.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: vur kac tipindeki bir unit. bir anda buyuk bir hasara sebep olabilir
bundle_tk.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: Bir bombaci. Guzel bir zirha sahip
bundle_tk.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: Guzel, buyuk bir unit. Hiz limiti ve kapesitesi iyidir
bundle_tk.properties.unit.draug.description: A primitive mining drone. Cheap to produce. Expendable. Automatically mines copper and lead in the vicinity. Delivers mined resources to the closest core.
bundle_tk.properties.unit.spirit.description: The starter drone unit. Spawns in the core by default. Automatically mines ores, collects items and repairs blocks.
bundle_tk.properties.unit.phantom.description: An advanced drone unit. Automatically mines ores, collects items and repairs blocks. Significantly more effective than a drone.
bundle_tk.properties.unit.crawler.description: A ground unit consisting of a stripped-down frame with high explosives strapped on top. Not particular durable. Explodes on contact with enemies.
bundle_tk.properties.unit.eruptor.description: A heavy mech designed to take down structures. Fires a stream of slag at enemy fortifications, melting them and setting volatiles on fire.
bundle_tk.properties.unit.ghoul.description: A heavy carpet bomber. Uses blast compound or pyratite as ammo.
bundle_tk.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Compresses chunks of coal into pure sheets of graphite.
bundle_tk.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle_tk.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coke in order to produce silicon.
bundle_tk.properties.block.kiln.description: Smelts sand and lead into metaglass. Requires small amounts of power.
bundle_tk.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_tk.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_tk.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_tk.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_tk.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_tk.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_tk.properties.block.melter.description: Heats up stone to very high temperatures to obtain lava.
bundle_tk.properties.block.separator.description: Exposes stone to water pressure in order to obtain various minerals contained in the stone.
bundle_tk.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes stone into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_tk.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifes oil into chunks of coal.
bundle_tk.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_tk.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_tk.properties.block.item-void.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_tk.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_tk.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.
bundle_tk.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_tk.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_tk.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_tk.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_tk.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_tk.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals buildings in its vicinity.
bundle_tk.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_tk.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_tk.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_tk.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moved items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_tk.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_tk.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_tk.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_tk.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.sorter.description: esyalari secer. rengi ayni olan esya ileriden, digerleri sagdan ve soldan devam eder
bundle_tk.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_tk.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_tk.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: sadece saga ve sola dagatir. onu kapalidir
bundle_tk.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_tk.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_tk.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_tk.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: The ultimate pump. Three times as fast as a mechanical pump and the only pump which is able to retrieve lava.
bundle_tk.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_tk.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_tk.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_tk.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_tk.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_tk.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_tk.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_tk.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_tk.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_tk.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_tk.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_tk.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_tk.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates a large amount of power from lava.
bundle_tk.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_tk.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_tk.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_tk.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_tk.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_tk.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied.
bundle_tk.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_tk.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_tk.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_tk.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_tk.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_tk.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_tk.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates the soil with water in order to obtain biomatter.
bundle_tk.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_tk.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_tk.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_tk.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_tk.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_tk.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_tk.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_tk.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch. Unfinished.
bundle_tk.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: An improved version of the launch pad. Stores more items. Launches more frequently.
bundle_tk.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_tk.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle_tk.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_tk.properties.block.arc.description: A small turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_tk.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_tk.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_tk.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_tk.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_tk.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_tk.properties.block.command-center.description: Issues movement commands to allied units across the map.\nCauses units to patrol, attack an enemy core or retreat to the core/factory. When no enemy core is present, units will default to patrolling under the attack command.
bundle_tk.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produces light drones which mine ore and repair blocks.
bundle_tk.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produces advanced drone units which are significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_tk.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_tk.properties.block.dart-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into a basic attack mech.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle_tk.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_tk.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_tk.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_tk.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_tk.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_tk.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.

bundle_tr.properties.link.trello.description: Planlanan özellikler için resmi Trello Sayfası
bundle_tr.properties.screenshot.invalid: Harita çok büyük, ekran görüntüsü için potansiyel olarak yeterli bellek yok.
bundle_tr.properties.name: İsim:
bundle_tr.properties.server.kicked.typeMismatch: Bu sunucu senin inşa türünle uyumlu değil.
bundle_tr.properties.server.kicked.recentKick: Yakın bir zamanda bir sunucudan atıldın.\nBağlanmadan önce bir süre bekle.
bundle_tr.properties.server.kicked.nameInUse: Sunucuda zaten o isimde biri var.
bundle_tr.properties.server.kicked.idInUse: Zaten bu sunucudasın! İki hesapla bir sunucuya bağlanamazsın.
bundle_tr.properties.server.kicked.customClient: Bu sunucu özel sürümleri kabul etmiyor. Resmi bir sürüm indir.
bundle_tr.properties.host.info:
[accent]host[], [scarlet]6567[] portunda bir sunucuya ev sahipliği yapıyor. 
Aynı [lightgray]wifi veya yerel ağdaki[] herkes sunucu listelerinde senin sunucunu görebiliyor olmalı.

Eğer diğerlerinin herhangi bir yerden IP ile bağlanabilmesini istiyorsan [accent]port yönlendirmesi[] gerekli.

[lightgray]Not: Eğer birisi senin yerel ağ oyununa katılmakta sorun yaşıyorsa güvenlik duvarı ayarlarında Mindustry'ye yerel ağ bağlantısı izni verdiğinden emin olun. Halka açık ağların zaman zaman sunucu aramaya engel olduğunu unutmayın.
bundle_tr.properties.join.info:
Burada, bağlanmak istediğin sunucunun [accent]IP[] adresini girebilir veya [accent]yerel ağ[] sunucularını görebilirsin..
Hem yerel ağ hem de geniş alan ağı çoklu oyuncu için destekleniyor.

[lightgray]Not: Otomatik bir global sunucu listesi yok; eğer birisine IP adresi kullanarak bağlanmak istiyorsan IP adresini istemelisin.
bundle_tr.properties.invalidid: Geçersiz Sürüm ID'si! Bir hata raporu gönder.
bundle_tr.properties.server.delete: Bu sunucuyu silmek istediğine emin misin?
bundle_tr.properties.confirmban: Bu kullanıcıyı yasaklamak istediğine emin misin?confirmkick
bundle_tr.properties.confirmunban: Bu kullanıcının yasağını kaldırmak istediğine emin misin?
bundle_tr.properties.confirmadmin: Bu kullanıcıyı bir yönetici yapmak istediğine emin misin?
bundle_tr.properties.confirmunadmin: Bu kullanıcının yönetici yetkilerini almak istediğine istediğine emin misin?
bundle_tr.properties.joingame.title: Oyuna Katıl
bundle_tr.properties.save.old: Bu kayıt oyunun eski bir sürümü için ve artık kullanılamaz.\n\n[lightgray]Tam 4.0 sürümü yayınlandığında geri kayıt özelliği eklenecek.
bundle_tr.properties.save.overwrite: Bu kayıdın üstüne yazmak istediğine\nemin misin?
bundle_tr.properties.save.delete.confirm: Bu kaydı silmek istediğine emin misin?
bundle_tr.properties.save.corrupted: [accent]Kayıt dosyası bozuk veya geçersiz!\nEğer oyununuzu kısa süre öce güncellediyseniz bu, kayıt formatındaki bir değişiklik. Bir hata [scarlet]değil[].
bundle_tr.properties.data.import.confirm:
Importing external data will erase[scarlet] all[] your current game data.
[accent]This cannot be undone![]

Once the data is imported, your game will exit immediately.
bundle_tr.properties.classic.export.text: [accent]Mindustry[] has just had a major update.\nClassic (v3.5 build 40) save or map data has been detected. Would you like to export these saves to your phone's home folder, for use in the Mindustry Classic app?
bundle_tr.properties.quit.confirm: Are you sure you want to quit?
bundle_tr.properties.quit.confirm.tutorial: Are you sure you know what you're doing?\nThe tutorial can be re-taken in[accent] Settings->Game->Re-Take Tutorial.[]
bundle_tr.properties.map.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this map? This action cannot be undone!
bundle_tr.properties.map.nospawn: This map does not have any cores for the player to spawn in! Add a[accent] orange[] core to this map in the editor.
bundle_tr.properties.map.nospawn.pvp: This map does not have any enemy cores for player to spawn into! Add[SCARLET] non-orange[] cores to this map in the editor.
bundle_tr.properties.map.nospawn.attack: This map does not have any enemy cores for player to attack! Add[SCARLET] red[] cores to this map in the editor.
bundle_tr.properties.map.invalid: Error loading map: corrupted or invalid map file.

bundle_tr.properties.zone.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_tr.properties.zone.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_tr.properties.zone.desertWastes.description:
These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.
Coal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.

[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
bundle_tr.properties.zone.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_tr.properties.zone.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_tr.properties.zone.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_tr.properties.zone.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_tr.properties.zone.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_tr.properties.zone.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_tr.properties.zone.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_tr.properties.zone.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_tr.properties.zone.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
bundle_tr.properties.settings.clear.confirm: Are you sure you want to clear this data?\nWhat is done cannot be undone!
bundle_tr.properties.settings.clearall.confirm: [scarlet]WARNING![]\nThis will clear all data, including saves, maps, unlocks and keybinds.\nOnce you press 'ok' the game will wipe all data and automatically exit.

bundle_tr.properties.mode.attack.name: Attack
bundle_tr.properties.mode.attack.description: Destroy the enemy's base. No waves.\n[gray]Requires a red core in the map to play.
